page.title: 19HORSE RIDING
page.content: Because of the great amount of open land in this area many people take their horses or ponies for exercise here. Sarah Wenham owns a 15.2 hands Bay gelding called "Max",and a light Bay Shetland/New Forest pony called "Brandy"; she often rides in this area. A favourite route of hers is over the Gump of Spurness, or following the track from Stove out to Carlin Foot. Because the ground is soft in this area it makes cantering safer. Due to the fact that the land is quite poor and mostly uncultivated here the owners have no objections to people going over it.
